body: in short, this is collection of ominaeshi and fanbox content included, yes?

Ominaeshi (aka Tachibana Omina - the creator of "Isekai Harem Monogatari") has taken on the moe-fus! I see that there are more pages added every time this gets "reposted" but I'd rather just wait and get a big upload than having 100's of small reuploads per version because a few pages were added....
